rows.label: tlk42350122_04_msg0001
rows.name:
The people living in Torigo are so kind.
They're preparing a place for people who
suddenly arrived.

rows.label: tlk42350122_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Normally, when someone enters your territory,
a fight breaks out, so it's amazing.

rows.label: tlk42350122_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I find turf wars to be a pain, so I'd
probably just give up my spot without a fight.

rows.label: tlk42350122_04_msg0004
rows.name:
At this rate, I think the newcomers
will quickly fit in and become friends
with everyone.
